document.full_text: no. 4 kentucky, which faces the top-seeded buckeyes in the round of 16 on friday, might have had an eerily similar lineup to ohio state were it not for the n.c.a.a. ruling in november that its freshman center, enes kanter, was permanently ineligible for accepting a salary while playing professionally in turkey.
document.title: what could have been for kentucky
lines_and_colors: no. 4 kentucky, which faces the top-seeded buckeyes in the round of 16 on friday, might have had an eerily similar lineup to ohio state were it not for the n.c.a.a. ruling in november that its freshman center, enes kanter, was permanently ineligible for accepting a salary while playing professionally in turkey.
